nodes.text: The Trandoshani Hunters Alliance was an organization of Trandoshan hunters that was active in the centuries after the Jedi Civil War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire under the Sith Lord Darth Revan. By the time of the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the Hunters Alliance had issued a 30,000 bounty on the Wookiee Bowdaar in revenge for the death and "dishonor" of the Trandoshan slaver Karssk.
The Trandoshani Hunters Alliance was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide, Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
